title: About
subtitle: Professional Journey
description: I am an experienced Full Stack Developer and Technical Lead with over ten years of experience in e-commerce development. My expertise focuses on Magento platforms, where I have successfully led numerous large-scale projects for major brands.

highlights.title: Key Highlights
items: Over 10 years of e-commerce development experience
Proven track record with major brands

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.description: Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work with leading brands across various sectors, from luxury retail to building materials. My focus has always been on delivering high-quality, scalable solutions that drive business growth.
